CustomField.formula: IF(Account_uB_Office__c = 'EMEA', 'support@u-blox.com', IF(Account_uB_Office__c = 'Americas','support_us@u-blox.com', IF(Account_uB_Office__c = 'Australia','support_anz@u-blox.com', IF(Account_uB_Office__c = 'Rest of APAC','support_ap@u-blox.com', IF(Account_uB_Office__c = 'China','support_cn@u-blox.com', IF(Account_uB_Office__c = 'India','support_in@u-blox.com', IF(Account_uB_Office__c = 'Japan','support_jp@u-blox.com', IF(Account_uB_Office__c = 'Korea','support_kr@u-blox.com', IF(Account_uB_Office__c = 'Taiwan','support_tw@u-blox.com','support_eu@u-blox.com' )))))))))
CustomField.label: From Address
